titles.title: EV GRID Act
Electric Vehicle Grid Readiness, Improvement, and Development Act
EV GRID Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to complete and publish a study and develop a plan relating to the ability of the electric system to meet the electricity demand of new electric vehicle charging infrastructure, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Electric Vehicle Grid Readiness, Improvement, and Development Act or the EV GRID Act
This bill requires the Department of Energy to complete and publish a study that assesses the ability of the electric system to meet the electricity demand of electric vehicle charging infrastructure that is installed on or after the enactment of this bill.
